Key Match Events: Aiden Markram scored 91 runs, taking South Africa close to the target
Usama Mir took 2 wickets for 45 runs
Tabraiz Shamsi took 4 wickets for 60 runs
Shaheen Afridi took 3 wickets for 45 runs
Haris Rauf nearly won the match with a diving catch
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa had not won a World Cup match since 1999
Pakistan won their first two games of the tournament
South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma acknowledged the team's pressure while chasing
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam expressed disappointment for the team's performance
Mickey Arthur warned against a 'witch-hunt' for the team's failures
South Africa's skipper Bavuma said they would have conversations to address their issues
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's fifth win in six matches moved them closer to the semifinals
Pakistan fell to their fourth consecutive defeat
Shadab Khan had to leave the field due to injury
